title: Clubs
body: Ever since clubs came out, my client has started lagging a bit. My friends are also experiencing this. Is anyone else having laggy/slow clients?

replies.body: Seems to be quite common right now. Check [this thread for some questions to answer so the issue can be investigated further](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/xMFyePnf-client-feels-slow-after-club-update?comment=0006)
